metadata.name: Headless Horsemini
metadata.description:
Headless Horsemini! We didn't forget him!
The Headless Horsemini is a tiny version of... you can guess who. The body and head act independently; the head will shoot a triple spread of tears and charge across the screen at enemies, whilst the body will spawn flies at random! You can find this inseparable pair in Treasure rooms!
Sprites and animations by Ashkait and coded by Scayze!
